articles.content: Allied Blenders and Distillers IPO: Allied Blenders and Distillers Ltd has fixed a price band of Rs 267 to Rs 281 per share for its Rs 1,500-crore initial public offering (IPO).

articles.author: KR Srivats
articles.title: FPIs pump ₹12,170 crore into Indian equities until June 21, reversing two-month selling trend - BusinessLine
articles.description: FPIs show optimism in Indian equities with net investments of ₹12,170 crore, driven by Modi 3.0 government's policy continuity.
articles.content: Reflecting optimism over the Modi 3.0 Governments policy continuity, Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPIs) doubled down on their investments in Indian equities last week, becoming net buyers of 12,170 c… [+3504 chars]

articles.author: Moneycontrol News
articles.title: Vedanta Resources denies stake sale in Vedanta Limited: Report - Moneycontrol
articles.description: As of the March quarter, Vedanta's promoters held a 61.95% stake in the company. Since December 2022, the promoter stake in Vedanta has decreased from just under 70% to slightly over 60%.
articles.content: Vedanta Resources Ltd., the parent company of the Indian-listed entity Vedanta Ltd., has categorically denied any plans to sell a stake in its subsidiary. "Vedanta Resources strongly denies any plans… [+1369 chars]
